statements: SELECT * FROM permissions
SELECT id, permission_type FROM permissions
SELECT user_id, file_id FROM permissions
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, user_id, permission_type FROM permissions
SELECT id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE file_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 7 ORDER BY permission_type ASC
SELECT id, file_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE 'read%'
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id IN (3, 5, 9) AND file_id = 2
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS permissions_count FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING permissions_count > 1 ORDER BY permissions_count DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT file_name, owner_id FROM files WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM files ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT file_name FROM files WHERE file_id = 3
SELECT users.username, files.file_name FROM users JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.owner_id
SELECT users.username, files.file_name FROM users JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.owner_id WHERE users.user_id = 4
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT file_name FROM files WHERE file_id > 5 ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read' AND user_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, files.file_name, permissions.permission_type FROM users INNER JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.owner_id INNER JOIN permissions ON files.file_id = permissions.file_id;
SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_type FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE permissions.permission_type = 'read';
SELECT users.username, COUNT(files.file_id) AS total_files FROM users LEFT JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.owner_id GROUP BY users.user_id ORDER BY total_files DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT user_id, file_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_level, files.file_name FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id INNER JOIN files ON permissions.file_id = files.file_id WHERE permissions.permission_level = 'read';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(file_id) AS total_files FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_files DESC;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(log_id) AS total_access_logs FROM users LEFT JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_access_logs > 5;

SELECT files.file_name, files.file_size, access_logs.access_time FROM files INNER JOIN access_logs ON files.file_id = access_logs.file_id WHERE files.file_size > 1000 ORDER BY access_logs.access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_id, file_name, owner_id FROM files WHERE owner_id = 'f6c73c05-64a5-4d48-9ad3-09376faac3d7';
SELECT f.file_name, r.role_name FROM files f JOIN file_permissions fp ON f.file_id = fp.file_id JOIN roles r ON fp.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT file_name FROM files WHERE permissions->>'public' = 'read';
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_name = 'example_file';
SELECT file_id, owner_id FROM files WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT files.file_name, users.username FROM files JOIN users ON files.owner_id = users.user_id;

SELECT files.file_name, roles.role_name FROM files JOIN file_permissions ON files.file_id = file_permissions.file_id JOIN roles ON file_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE file_permissions.read_permission = TRUE;

SELECT files.file_name, roles.role_name FROM roles JOIN file_permissions ON roles.role_id = file_permissions.role_id JOIN files ON file_permissions.file_id = files.file_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'admin';
